name: Akitsuki
description: Bringing DeFi to e-sport and gamers, play and compete on any game and earn from our treasury. Hold and earn, Play and earn: Token holders can access our private discord's category where they can participate in our DAO, and play any game and expect to earn rewards. They also receive increased cash prizes on Guardian Games, our e-sport tournaments, streamed on our twitch channel. We provide cash prize thanks to our treasury, the treasury provides liquidity to various well known DeFi protocols to generate organic returns for the project.
